name: ChampionX Corporation
description: ChampionX Corporation is a leading provider of chemistry solutions and services, focusing on the oil and gas industry. Headquartered in The Woodlands, Texas, the company was formed through the merger of Apergy Corporation and ChampionX in 2020, combining their strengths in production and drilling chemicals, as well as reservoir management solutions. ChampionX delivers a comprehensive suite of products designed to enhance production efficiencies and optimize asset performance. Their innovative solutions include scale inhibitors, corrosion inhibitors, and biocides, which are critical for maintaining the integrity of oil and gas infrastructure. The company is committed to sustainability, offering environmentally friendly products and solutions that minimize the ecological footprint of its operations. ChampionX leverages advanced technology and data analytics to provide real-time insights and improve decision-making for its clients. With a strong global presence, ChampionX serves a diverse customer base, from independent operators to major integrated oil companies, ensuring they can maximize production while reducing costs and risks. The company is dedicated to safety and operational excellence, striving to deliver value through its technical expertise and customer-oriented approach.
